data.name: Crash Time 2
data.detailed_description:
High-Speed Open-World Police Racing

Crash Time 2 is an open-world arcade racing game that puts you behind the wheel of high-powered police vehicles on the German Autobahn. As a member of the Autobahn police, you’ll patrol a large free-roaming world, respond to crimes, and engage in intense high-speed chases reaching nearly 200 MPH.

Take on criminal cases, escort VIPs, transport valuable cargo, and pursue suspects across highways, city streets, and rural roads. You’re free to follow structured missions or explore the open world and respond to crimes as they happen.

Story-Driven Cases and Free-Roam Gameplay

The game features 5 major criminal cases, each made up of multiple missions that can be tackled in different ways. In addition to case missions, Crash Time 2 offers free-roam police gameplay with bonus assignments, hidden objectives, and optional mini-games scattered throughout the map.

With over 40 tracks and locations, the world encourages exploration while rewarding skilled driving and fast decision-making.

Arcade Racing with Police Action

Crash Time 2 focuses on accessible arcade handling combined with action-oriented police mechanics. Choose from over 20 AI-driven vehicles, each featuring a visual damage system that reacts to collisions and crashes. Three difficulty settings allow both casual players and racing veterans to tailor the experience to their playstyle.

Key Features

  • Open-world arcade racing with police-themed gameplay

  • Play as an Autobahn police officer in high-speed pursuits

  • 5 criminal cases with multiple missions each

  • Free-roam mode with dynamic crimes and bonus objectives

  • Over 40 tracks and locations to explore

  • Vehicles reaching speeds close to 200 MPH

  • Visual damage system for AI vehicles

  • 3 difficulty levels for customizable challenge

  • Hidden tasks and mini-games throughout the world

data.short_description: Crash Time 2 is an open-world arcade racing game where you play as an Autobahn police officer, engaging in high-speed chases, escort missions, and criminal investigations across a large free-roaming map.

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS *: Windows XP/Vista
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible 256 MB graphics card
  • DirectX®: 9.0c
  • Hard Drive: 4.2 GB of available hard disk space
  • Sound: DirectX compatible audio card
